issue.title: Create a USB filter for OptiTrack in VM

content.raw:
Update: I found a fix for this, but deploying it will be difficult because it includes finding the vendor and product ID of each team's Optitrack device and editing their VM file. We will need to do a remote help session to update the teams.

It might be easiest just to implement the fix as teams bring up the issue with us, or announce that we have a fix and offer to do the remote help session, and/or refer them to the following documentation:

In a terminal, `lsusb`

Find vendor:product ID for Natural Point Optitrack

Edit the vmware .vmx file in `~/vmware/Windows\ 7\ x64`, find the line `usb.autoConnect.device1 = ""` and write the following in:

`usb.autoConnect.device1 = "<vendor>:<productID> autoclean:0"`
